website_summaries.verdict: A budget-priced serrated utility knife that holds its own, even when compared to the priciest knives.
pros: This stainless steel knife contains a high carbon content to help increase the knife's durability and maintain its sharp edge
It is effective at cutting through delicate foods such as fruit without crushing
The company welcomes input from users to continually make its products better
cons: While some may appreciate the lighter weight of this knife, it does mean you must work a little harder when slicing

customer_reviews.title: Close to perfection.
customer_reviews.text: After almost 1/2 a century of cooking, this is the most perfect small format knife I've ever had. It's lightweight and well balanced. (No, heavy knives are not better.) Nimble size and shape is easy to handle and control. Very sharp, and stays that way. The handle does not get slippery when holding with wet hands. Things do not stick to the blade. I do wish it had less curvature to the edge. But that's really a minor issue.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Szava-kovats

customer_reviews.title: Very good for an inexpensive knife
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased a few of these knives over the years. They work well for an inexpensive knife -- please be aware that I am not comparing this to a high-quality knife such as those manufactured by Wusthof or Henckels. The serrations do wear down over time. But, for me, the knife serves as a very handy kitchen tool for several years. When the serrations become too worn, I replace it with another one.
customer_reviews.author: SheSellsSeashells

customer_reviews.title: Another OXO winner.
customer_reviews.text: I have used OXO products pretty much exclusively for my kitchen and storage stuff. When I needed to replace my chef's knife I looked at so many choices at Amazon. I really didn't have a clue which one to get. BUT-when I saw the OXO knife I relied on my personal excellent experiences with OXO products and purchased it. It is a fabulous chef knife. It's really sharp! The handle fits into my hand well. The weight distribution is good also. It's my go to knife. And OXO continues to be my go to brand
customer_reviews.author: B. C. PoppeTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable in my hand and sharp enough to get the job done
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable in my hand and sharp enough to get the job done. I dice/chop/slice a multitude of veggies for salads/pizza/migas etc... If you gave me a sharper knife, I might do damage to myself accidentally. Hubby even liked using it. As a person who suffered with carpal tunnel for many years you have to be careful not to re-injure this area of your hand. Oxo products are made for people like me.
customer_reviews.author: TXk

customer_reviews.title: This thing sucks
customer_reviews.text: I do a lot of roma tomato and lemon prep so I figured, why not try a serrated utility knife? What's the biggest difference there could be between a cheaper one and a Zwilling or Shun? Lesson learned! This thing doesn't do anything particularly well, except take up space in the kitchen. I would be able to forgive its lack of cutting prowess if it were comfortable to hold and use, but the grip is tiny and awkward, and this is coming from a guy with relatively dainty hands. At least it's another knife I can trust my roommates with.
customer_reviews.author: Stirling

customer_reviews.title: Stiff blade! Good for slicing jamon 'armor'
customer_reviews.text: I did not by this as a bread knife---rather, I bought it to help cut away the extremely hard fat covering the outside of a leg of Jamon. You don't want a serrated blade for the meat, but cutting through the hardened fat on the sides of the leg really does require a serrated knife. This knife was sturdy enough for the task! Many bread knives have blades that are too flexible and flimsy, whereas this one is stiff enough to work with something other than just bread! If it is stiff enough for jamon, it is stiff enough for anything else in the kitchen!
customer_reviews.author: I.R.M.

customer_reviews.title: A little large
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my wife to replace one she had. This knife is one inch larger and does not have the forked point that she liked. It does not fit her hand as well as it is to big. Other than that, it is an excellent knife, sharp, cuts everything well.
customer_reviews.author: pjs

customer_reviews.title: Excellent knife - highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Having worked as a buyer in a kitchen products retail store, I'm always skeptical of knives I cannot pick up and feel before purchase. I figured as a paring knife (not the most expensive of knives) and being made by OXO which is a brand I trust, I would give it a shot. This knife is excellent. Good weight to it, comfortable, and the German made blade is not only sharp but seems like a very durable temper to it so will hold up nicely over time and repeated sharpening. I plan to purchase more OXO knives in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: BEST KNIFE FOR VALUE
customer_reviews.text: I am a knife snob. I have had one Henckels knife from more than 15 years ago. I needed something new and bigger. I went searching for another 5" Henckels but then came across this one in comparison so I ordered it since the Henckels knives started at $75+. Wow. The handle fits so well in my hand, and I use it on potatoes, apples, tomatoes and avocados. It really does everything very well. I've gifted this knife twice now.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly K Stout

customer_reviews.title: Far exceeds its price
customer_reviews.text: I have had the previous generation of this knife for about 10 years, and I totally love it. It balances well, is extremely sharp (I use a sharpening steel almost every use) and the grip is equally great. This new, Professional version, has more steel in the handle, which makes it better balanced. I bought this one for a Xmas present for someone, and they Love it too.
customer_reviews.author: SylverBullit

customer_reviews.title: Great set of knives for easy meal prep
customer_reviews.text: I love this set! They are sharp, the featured knives are relevant for cooking and eating, and they are durable. This is my second set, as I left the others with my ex. Forget about very expensive knives unless you are a chef - these do the trick for all of your cooking needs. The steak knives are terrific and the look compliments any table.
customer_reviews.author: Marie Cosgrove

customer_reviews.title: I threw all the other knives away
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect knife. In fact, I threw all our other knives away! This one cuts small items and large items so easily. I cut produce every day for our meals and I only use this knife...from strawberries to carrots to tomatoes. I just rinse it off. Feels good in your hand like all OXO products. I think I will get the small version too!
customer_reviews.author: Wanda G

customer_reviews.title: My new favorite knife
customer_reviews.text: I'm not a knife snob, but I cook a lot and appreciate a sharp blade. This has quickly become my favorite knife and it's the first one I reach for in the kitchen. It's the perfect size for almost all of the cooking and food prep I do. The handle is very ergonomic and the knife has a nice weight to it.
customer_reviews.author: AMG

customer_reviews.title: Great knife for chopping
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves using this type of knife. Easy to sharpen. Good for chopping. OXO used to have the soft rubbery handle on this knife. The solid handle on this newer model is comfortable and better all around. This size of the blade is ideal for routine food prep. You don't have to spend a fortune for a good everyday kitchen knife.
customer_reviews.author: M Lee

customer_reviews.title: worth it
customer_reviews.text: 15$ might seem a little expensive just for a knife sharper to a college student like me. However, I enjoy cooking and a dull knife just won't cut it. This rod looking thing was totally worth it! got my 25$ knife razor sharp again in less then a min with this tool.
customer_reviews.author: chih-han Su

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: OXO Good Grips knives are the only ones I use. I have several styles and have gifted sets of them to my children and they like them as well.
customer_reviews.author: Monique

customer_reviews.title: 👩‍🍳
customer_reviews.text: I already own 4 of these knives and they are great. They take sharpening beautifully. They last a long while before they need sharpening. I use them to cut vegetables. They fit in my hand comfortably and the blade is just the right length to work with.
customer_reviews.author: shopper

customer_reviews.title: Buy this knife!!!
customer_reviews.text: Use this knife almost everyday!!! Bought a German knife (same size and similar style) and this OXO knife fits my hand better, is just a hair larger, and is sharper. Would recommend this knife for yourself or as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Golf Bob

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Amazing quality. Better than others we’ve paid several times more for.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Fisher

customer_reviews.title: Great knife
customer_reviews.text: I bought this knife both for the price and the good review from Serious Eats. It is light, easy to hold and slices tomatoes and small fruits as it is designed to do. I cannot think of anything negative to say except I am not sure how you sharpen a serrated knife!!
customer_reviews.author: Alex H.

customer_reviews.title: EASY TO USE
customer_reviews.text: This is my primary knife for fruits and vegetables. Perfect fit for chopping off the end of a bundle of celery stalks or fresh carrots; and slicing tomatoes and lemons. Much easier to use than the 7.5" long blade; but just as sharp. Well worth the investment!
customer_reviews.author: CFitz

customer_reviews.title: Great affordable knife.
customer_reviews.text: I just really like the feel of this knife in my hand. You can definitely buy higher quality knives, but if you are looking for an affordable knife that is pleasant to use, this is a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Garrett Fuller

customer_reviews.title: The one thing I do not like about this knife
customer_reviews.text: I have noticed that when I lay the knife down if I don't pay attention, it tends to turn over with the blade side up because that is the side of the knife handle that has a flat surface. Other than that I really do like this knife.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela

customer_reviews.title: Not as advertised
customer_reviews.text: This knife is NOT SERRATED!! I bought two others (same picture/description) this year that ARE serrated. This was my third purchase of the same knife.
customer_reviews.author: Jane Doe

customer_reviews.title: Cuts great
customer_reviews.text: they are great handle them careful and treat them like a baby when washing them
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not what I've come to expect from OXO
customer_reviews.text: I'm a fan of OXO products, we buy a lot of them. But this knife is not one of their best products. The blade is very thin and if it's held like a chef's knife, it's pretty uncomfortable. Also, it's quite light, which means even for vegetables, there's no help coming from the knife. The handle is comfortable and the knife came nice and sharp. However, after a few weeks of use the knife is already losing a bit of its sharpness.
customer_reviews.author: K. Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Initially knives worked great. Now I have had the set for -just- over a year and they have become rusty at the handle edges. Have always been hand washed and dried shortly after. Sharpening has made them dented instead of sharp. Bummed out I wasted money on this as most Oxo products have been really great. Wish I could get a refund to buy a different set of knives.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: Well made inexpensive knife. Balanced. Blade is too thin and a bit flimsy. Good for average tasks.
customer_reviews.author: NOLA Native

customer_reviews.title: IT IS SHARP!
customer_reviews.text: Does very good job of dicing veggies. Is sharper than I expected. Needs to have protector for blade when not in use. I cut my finger when I touched blade while removing another knife from the drawer. This would make a great gift for someone not afraid to use a sharp knife.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good knife
customer_reviews.text: Great knife. I would recommend. Now, if they had the 4" for a decent price. That is my favorite.
customer_reviews.author: Nan

customer_reviews.title: Serrated edge makes it great for any cutting
customer_reviews.text: Bread, tomatoes, or anything, great utility knife. I had a similar one for years and then lost it, glad to find this one with same blade and even better handle. My Mom had one too, considered it her favorite knife
customer_reviews.author: Mark A. Lipowicz

customer_reviews.title: Totally awesome knife!
customer_reviews.text: Totally awesome chef knife! Sharp as a razor! Where has this been all my life?
customer_reviews.author: smi

customer_reviews.title: Liked the "fat" handle of knife in previous model better.
customer_reviews.text: Handle of knife does not fit in my arthritic hands as well as the older model did. Liked the fat, rubbery grip better. Knife is very thin and very sharp, making fast work of hand held food-cutting jobs.
customer_reviews.author: Joycie

customer_reviews.title: Kitchen Sword
customer_reviews.text: This knife can do most kitchen tasks. Meat & Vegetables, Got it covered. Very good, versatile knife.
customer_reviews.author: johnnydrumbone

customer_reviews.title: Great Kitchen Knife
customer_reviews.text: This has become my go-to knife for small jobs. Love the heavy and sharp blade.
customer_reviews.author: Kenny Kwong

customer_reviews.title: Great knife
customer_reviews.text: It is very sharp and cuts through crusty bread like a charm!
customer_reviews.author: Spears

customer_reviews.title: Great knife for simple everyday use
customer_reviews.text: I was looking through many stores near me for a 5-6 inch serrated knife at a reasonable price. When this gem arrived in my mail, I wondered why I hadn't discovered it sooner. I purchased a second OXO knife for my daughter since we were fighting over who got to use this knife in the kitchen!
customer_reviews.author: Concerned Senior Citizen

customer_reviews.title: Great addition for any kitchen
customer_reviews.text: Couldnt be happier. Great value and super sharp. A definite go to for prepping veggies and meals
customer_reviews.author: J roberts

customer_reviews.title: Sharp & easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: It’s a great knife. The ease of slicing vegetables is worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Holcomb

customer_reviews.title: Great team!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely awesome knife. We went through so many knives until we found this one. Sharp, light, and comfortable to hold.
customer_reviews.author: Lou Capo

customer_reviews.title: Great first budget knife to use
customer_reviews.text: Great size for smaller hands to start building knife skills. The handle is amazing to hold and for a first knife at $15 this is amazing. Will have to update to see how sharp the knife stays.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew H

customer_reviews.title: works well.
customer_reviews.text: works well. Cook a lot and do much prep work. Makes it easier with this knife
customer_reviews.author: Robert Davis

customer_reviews.title: Great knife for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great knife for the price. Stays sharp and feels comfortable in my small hand.
customer_reviews.author: JayCeeBee

customer_reviews.title: The perfict fit for my hand. (size 7 1/2 glove)
customer_reviews.text: Perfectly sharp, comfortable and easy to use, I love this knife.
customer_reviews.author: An observent customer

customer_reviews.title: Great knife
customer_reviews.text: I was not sure when I received this knife I would like it because it's bigger then what I usually use. However it has become my go to knife. Sharp, lightweight and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Jkayd

customer_reviews.title: Okay at the price.
customer_reviews.text: I also own a Hoffritz 5" utility knife. The latter is sharper and cuts with less effort. It is also 4X the price.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron F. Kopman

customer_reviews.title: incredibly sharp and the handle is extremely comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Perfectly balanced, incredibly sharp and the handle is extremely comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Walt

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I am new to sharpening knives but I love the larger handle and the steel is just long enough to handle my larger knives, but yet still fits in my knife block. It does what it is suposed to do, which is put a nice fine hone on the blade. It also works with scissors and pocket knives.
customer_reviews.author: L. Maynard

customer_reviews.title: Nice knife.
customer_reviews.text: Slightly larger than what I wanted, but it has a very nice feel and I like it. Very much like the other OXO Pro knives that I have.
customer_reviews.author: amazon user

customer_reviews.title: Knives that do the work for you -yay!
customer_reviews.text: I have been running our family ktichen for years without giving a thought to honing my knives. I do sharpen them from time to time, but discovered that that is a whole different kettle of fish. This product changed everything in our kitchen! It's easy to use, easy to store and clean, and the price is right. If your looking to get your knives in better shape, I certainly recommend this steel.
customer_reviews.author: Pae

customer_reviews.title: Love It
customer_reviews.text: I had no idea these wear out....I've had my original sharpener for 13 years when I noticed it was not working as well as it once did on my good knives. I purchased the OXO sharpener to replace it and to my joy it works great! I can only hope it will last as long as my original.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Reasonably-priced knife set
customer_reviews.text: Yay! Reasonably priced knife set with an excellent variety of my most-used pieces.It's so nice to have sharp knives again!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Kermish

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: Love these knives - makes cutting in the kitchen so much easier. Great quality, design and fit for hand!
customer_reviews.author: C. M. Burns

customer_reviews.title: Great Knife for the moola
customer_reviews.text: Nice sharp and balanced knife. If it holds its edge it's a 5 * Let you know later about the edge.
customer_reviews.author: wado

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t easily cut thru anything
customer_reviews.text: Hardly cuts through an orange, I bought because the reviews were good but now I rarely even use this knife.
customer_reviews.author: Karen S.

customer_reviews.title: Razor sharp and easy to handle
customer_reviews.text: Sharp as a razor and easy to handle. I like this knife to carve chicken and slice vegetables.
customer_reviews.author: Svimburg

customer_reviews.title: Good knife for a good price.
customer_reviews.text: This thing is sharp, and well balanced. Much better than other low end cutlery I have bought.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Linhart

customer_reviews.title: Great jnife
customer_reviews.text: Great knife in all ways. Takes the place of three knives
customer_reviews.author: Barb

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this knife and use it every day. Fantastic for chopping up veggies.
customer_reviews.author: STrout

customer_reviews.title: Use it all the time now.
customer_reviews.text: Had never used a sharpening steel before. Now I use it often. Takes a little practice to get the sharpening movement down easily but then it's just swish, swish, swish to keep your blades sharp.
customer_reviews.author: Joel

customer_reviews.title: I love this knife
customer_reviews.text: I love this knife. Had one for years and it disappeared. Think it accidentally got tossed with peelings. Couldn't find one in the stores around here so was very glad Amazon had it.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Would be a great house worming/ wedding gift
customer_reviews.text: These have been great! I highly recommend them (for the price). I've owned Hinkles I like these a bit better.
customer_reviews.author: Charles R.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Value Honing Steel
customer_reviews.text: I got this specifically for a new Victorinox 8" Chef's Knife, and I've found that using this nice honing steel before every veggie chopping session has helped me keep the bade on my new knife absolutely razor sharp. Love the soft and easy grip handle.
customer_reviews.author: Derek Dean

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: It’s a great addition to my knifes and use it daily.
customer_reviews.author: Betsy Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Quality of product and price
customer_reviews.text: I love these knives, they are so sharp and well within anyones budget. I have the larger one and wanted a little bit smaller one, so glad I purchased this size.
customer_reviews.author: Roxanna Hilliard

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: This knife must be cheap. Is rusting already. Shape great. Quality terrible.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Michael E. Dillon

customer_reviews.title: Impressive for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great for the price! Curious how long sharpness will last.
customer_reviews.author: Avik

customer_reviews.title: great balance
customer_reviews.text: Excellent weight, balance and cutting ability. Great for vegetables, meats, cheeses and splitting pills.
customer_reviews.author: DD

customer_reviews.title: great buy.
customer_reviews.text: The knife is really good. It has been nice and sharp.
customer_reviews.author: Robbie Gondara

customer_reviews.title: Terrific Knife
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this knife. It does a great job with tomatoes and has made my life much easier in the kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Shelly Daniels

customer_reviews.title: HONING steel
customer_reviews.text: Remember people, you hone your blade on this, not sharpen. It's a good length for most chef's nice and does what it needs to. Learn your proper knife sharpening skills and this will serve you well. The grip is sturdy and non slip.
customer_reviews.author: SC

customer_reviews.title: Knives
customer_reviews.text: Nice set. I shopped around and finally decided on this set for durability, quality, and ergonomics.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Boyd

customer_reviews.title: Good knife.
customer_reviews.text: Love the knife -we wanted a second. It is well designed to fit very comfortably in the hand and the blade is just right for chopping. Great price for a knife of superior quality.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this set of knives. Easy to use and great grip when slicing. Arrived in excellent condition.
customer_reviews.author: Ana Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Perfect small knife!
customer_reviews.text: It cuts food easily and is very comfortable to hold while slicing or chopping.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara C.

customer_reviews.title: Simple and very good
customer_reviews.text: Really good! Since I used first time all my knife are kept sharp.
customer_reviews.author: Cesar Murillo

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, good weight, beats victorinox
customer_reviews.text: Good weight, much sturdier than the victorinox alternative. Fits in with my nicer knives.
customer_reviews.author: Katardin

customer_reviews.title: Great Knife
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased, sharpens well, cuts well, what else can I say
customer_reviews.author: Paul W.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This steel makes my knives razor sharp, and it was at a good price as well. I could tell a definite difference before sharpening and after- it was like night and day.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again!
customer_reviews.text: Works just as it should. Nice comfortable handle and plenty long enough for up to 8 inch knives (at least, that's the longest I have).
customer_reviews.author: J. Emlay

customer_reviews.title: Functional
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable to use. Not too big, not too small.
customer_reviews.author: Linda G. O'Connell

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: Great knives. I would recommend to anyone and not so expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth taylor

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I liked the design and razor sharp blade. Excellent grip for cutting and peeling!
customer_reviews.author: Ronald E Cathey

customer_reviews.title: Sharpening steel
customer_reviews.text: You can't go wrong with OXO. This is exactly what I wanted and the price was where I wanted to spend. Thank you, OXO!
customer_reviews.author: ndlogan

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Highly recomend!! Holds a great edge and is very affordable!
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done.
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable handle, stable tang. In the right hands is an excellent tool for knife maintenance.
customer_reviews.author: Robby T.

customer_reviews.title: Greg
customer_reviews.text: It came quickly, 6 days with Amazon's free shipping. It came today and within 10 mins all my knifes were very sharp. I then gave my new OXO 6.5 knife (I ordered this with the hone) a few passes over my sharping stone then 10 light passes on the hone "WOW" I can shave with this now. I like the handles/grips on all of my OXO products. Very pleased. Well worth the price (14.95)
customer_reviews.author: Greg R. Oglesby

customer_reviews.title: Keen Edges
customer_reviews.text: One of the best sharpening steels that I have used. It is small compared to some but it is convient to use and my wife has no problems holding and using it. Puts a fine edge on my knives.
customer_reviews.author: Camp Cook

customer_reviews.title: good steel, good price.
customer_reviews.text: This steel does a good job and is very comfortable to use. I give my knives a pass or two each time I use them and they stay very sharp.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Crocker

customer_reviews.title: I love this knife
customer_reviews.text: I love this knife. It's super sharp and big enough to tackle most prep jobs I need to do in my kitchen. I chop tons of veggies, break down hundreds of chicken wings, and lots of other stuff. It's the perfect size!
customer_reviews.author: Alyn S.

customer_reviews.title: Happiness is a sharp knife
customer_reviews.text: A great deal for a great product. Delivered on time in great condition. Great deal, very fair price. Now I'm sharpening my friends knives as well
customer_reviews.author: Mark Caplin

customer_reviews.title: OXO Good Grips Professional Sharpening Steel
customer_reviews.text: This sharpening steel was a gift and according to the receiver of the gift a very good tool and great at keeping knives sharp.
customer_reviews.author: GCollins

customer_reviews.title: A sharp knife is a pleasure
customer_reviews.text: A sharp knife is a pleasure. Buy this thing and watch a few youtube videos and you can make a difference in your cooking prep chores.
customer_reviews.author: OldBikeRider

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: Not much to say regarding a knife sharpening steel. This Oxo sharpens knives very well and has deep grooves that should last a long time. It is a good value in sharpening steels.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Kurtzer

customer_reviews.title: Great. No. Thin enough to where it will maintain a good sharpie edge. I'd buy it again.
customer_reviews.text: Great. No. Thin enough to where it will maintain a good sharpie edge. I'd buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Robert E. Bowen

customer_reviews.title: great buy, great price
customer_reviews.text: Only complaint is that the handle is really hard to slide into my knife roll b/c of the grip. Otherwise, great buy, great price.
customer_reviews.author: Reed Hall

customer_reviews.title: Simple and it works
customer_reviews.text: Love the OXO brand and have several knives. This has the same type of rubberized handle, good stuff. Has kept my knives pretty sharp so far.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: pretty good at a good price
customer_reviews.text: Not having experience with other things, this one does the job. it works well for me. happy with the product
customer_reviews.author: MikeDD86

customer_reviews.title: Nice Sharpening Steel
customer_reviews.text: Stupid simple to use, and does what it promises. Love me some OXO design.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Davidson

customer_reviews.title: Oxo Good Grips Professional Sharpening Steel Knife Sharpener
customer_reviews.text: Great Grip! Love Oxo!! Sharpens quickly and has a great grip for someone like me who has issues with my hands.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca L. Rabin

product_meta.title: OXO Good Grips Pro 5" Serrated Utility Knife
product_meta.description: Style Name:5" SerratedOXO Good Grips Knives are thoughtfully designed to provide the perfect balance of feel and function. The contours of the handle and curved bolster encourage you to hold the Knife in a way that is both comfortable and efficient, no matter where you choose to grip. Each knife features a full tang blade for balance and control during all tasks, from simple slices to complicated cuts. Forged from high-carbon, German stainless steel for superior strength and edge retention, OXO Good Grips Knives are made to have a long life in your kitchen, no matter what you're slicing or dicing.
feature_bullets: Serrated Utility Knife easily slices tomatoes and citrus without crushing the delicate fruit
Fully forged blade, bolster and tang for superior balance, strength and durability
German stainless steel with high carbon content for lasting sharpness and edge retention
